extendedInfo.description: Your health is in your hands.MyMedBox is your Secure Personal Health Record (PHR).  CSI provides you with the tools to manage you and your family health records.  A centralized place to store your:MedicationImmunizationsAlertsAllergies  + Refill reminder All data is encryptedalso checkout our new app motionPHR

reviews.comment: Clunky UI, terrible data entry fields in all areas. Appears an amateurish app made by someone with no medical knowledge. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would be nice to be able to track meds taken for the day. Also password is too much i mean every time you click you have to retype your password
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The UI is indeed clunky & I was hoping to store info for multiple people.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I\'ve been waiting for this to come out for weeks. It\'s worth the price if you take lots of meds like I do. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I wish didn\'t have to put in password incase emergency no one can get in to check your meds
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a excellent app. Great upgrade and well worth the price. I tell everyone who takes lots of medications about it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a very helpful app. Love it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Installed, but haven\'t tried yet. Is it possible to add pics of each medication? PLEASE! HTC EVO!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like the app wish i could put my sons med and info to and keep it seperate from mine
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fire Dept told me this App could save lives and is a MUST HAVE for people that need to call them alot. Gives medical info instantly when you can\'t.
reviews.author: A Google User
